options.text: Nothing of interest.
Small rocks on the trail slows you down.
Snow and sleet slows you down.
Wet and slippery stones slows you down.
Steep slopes slows you down.
Razor-like rocks slows you down.
Deep narrow valleys slows you down.
Glaring sun slows you down.
Deep gravel slows you down.
Murder of crows slows you down.
Muddy ground slows you down.
A toppled dwarven statue blocks your way.
Large boulders blocks your way.
White-water creeks in deep gorges blocks your way.
A trail ruined by spring water blocks your way.
A fallen bridge blocks your way.
A deep ravine blocks your way.
Sheer cliffs blocks your way.
A tightrope bridge blocks your way.
Boiling mud pits blocks your way.
An avalanche blocks your way.
A snowstorm stops you.
A landslide stops you.
A great canyon stops you.
A hot lava field stops you.
A flooded river stops you.
Stones formed by ancient magic stops you.
An Earthquake stops you.
A sudden downpour stops you.
Geothermal geysers stops you.
Hot lava pits stops you
You lose your way due to a thick ash cloud.
You lose your way due to a heavy fog.
You lose your way due to losing the trail.
You lose your way due to winding rocky trails.
You lose your way due to no landmarks in sigh.
The heroes trigger a dwarven spear trap. The heroes take 1d10 HP damage if they fail the Survival skill roll.
A hidden hot spring. The heroes take 1d5 HP damage if they fail the Survival skill roll.
A landslide hits the heroes. The heroes take 2d10 HP damage if they fail the Survival skill roll.
A falling boulder. The heroes take 1d10 HP damage if they fail the Survival skill roll and the noise attracts a nearby monster.
A bridge falls from under the heroes. The heroes take 3d10 HP damage if they fail the Survival skill roll.
A small cave where a friendly dwarven hermit lives.
A large cave where a friendly nomad human tribe lives.
A large cave where a friendly dwarven tribe of craftsmen lives.
A small cave where a friendly human sorcerer lives.
A small cave where an indifferent dwarven hermit lives.
A large cave where an indifferent nomad human tribe lives.
A large cave where an indifferent dwarven tribe of craftsmen lives.
A small cave where an indifferent human sorcerer lives.
A large cave where an unfriendly nomad human tribe lives.
A large cave where an unfriendly dwarven tribe of craftsmen lives.
An abandoned dwarven outpost.
An abandoned landsknecht outpost.
An abandoned orcish outpost.
An old outpost where a retired landsknecht lives.
A recent landsknecht outpost, manned.
A manned dwarven fort.
A manned human merchant trading-station.
An on-alert landsknecht outpost.
An on-alert dwarven fort.
An on-alert human trading-station..
An abandoned human silver mine.
An abandoned dwarven copper mine.
A human iron mine.
A dwarven iron mine.
Ruins, already explored.
Ruins, partially explored.
Ruins, not explored.
Ruins, not explored and inhabited.
An abandoned silver mine
A crypt
A dwarven cave village
A castle
A castle with a dungeon
partially covered with ash and
completely covered with ash and
partially underground and
completely underground and
partially underwater and
completely in ruins.
crumbled and decayed.
twisted by magic.
collapsed.
contaminated by cataclysmic forces.
Nothing happens.
A large eagle crashes to the ground not far from the heroes. It spreads it wings again and takes off, without noticing the heroes.
Three orcs spot the heroes across a gorge. They shake their fists at the heroes, before turning back the way they came.
A cave lion feasts on a goblin, it growls angrily and warns the heroes to come any closer.
A pair of griffins flying high in the sky, miles away from the heroes.
Two goblins chase down a goat far below the heroes.
A troll comes crashing down the mountain side and falls dead at the heroes’ feet.
A black arrow thuds in the ground not far from the heroes, obviously made by orcs, though none are in sight.
A large ram is startled by the heroes. It shakes it head and seems ready to charge the heroes, then suddenly turns tails and runs.
Three grimwings circle above the heroes for a while before losing interest and flying away.
A saddled horse, covered in blood, comes galloping down the path. It charges wildeyed past the heroes.
Somewhere near, someone snores loudly.
The roar of a cave lion echoes in the mountains.
The echo of a large boulder hitting something, which screams in agony.
Heavy footsteps coming the heroes’ way.
Heavy footsteps moving away from the heroes.
Heavy beatings of leathery wings.
Somewhere near an orc warlord issues commands to his subordinates.
The bellowing of a large ram.
Arcane whispers on the wind.
The sound of hammers pounding on an anvil.
A bloody human handprint on a large stone, still wet.
Tracks left by a very large humanoid.
Large griffin feathers on a bloody ground.
An abandoned orc camp.
A dead goat, killed by a cave lion.
The mutilated corpse of a troll.
Dragon scales.
Three black arrows stuck in a tree stump.
An overturned wagon, stripped clean of valuables.
A single finger of a dwarf, seemingly torn off the hand.
A dwarven craftsman that is returning home from the nearest city.
A dwarven craftsman that is looking for a certain type of rock for his work.
A dwarven craftsman that lost his way after spying on a tribe of goblins.
A dwarven craftsman that is looking for the tools his father had and lost in these mountains.
A dwarven craftsman that needs help returning to his family’s mine.
A dwarven craftsman that needs healing after being ambushed by two orcs.
A dwarven craftsman that knows these mountains and can give the heroes directions.
A dwarven craftsman that is on his way to the nearest village to sell his craftsmanship.
A dwarven craftsman that is returning from a nearby dwarven mine where he was an apprentice to a master craftsman.
A dwarven craftsman that is being tracked by monsters.
An adventuring party that has lost half its members to ambushing trolls.
An adventuring party that is returning home after finding a possible magical item.
An adventuring party that is on a quest for one of the merchant princes.
An adventuring party that was betrayed by a tiberlite and are on the run.
An adventuring party that contains a wanted criminal.
An adventuring party that is looking for a wanted criminal.
An adventuring party that is returning home after an unsuccessful adventure.
An adventuring party that is out of rations and food.
An adventuring party that needs healing.
An adventuring party that is followed by monsters.
A landsknecht that is seeking a known bandit leader.
A landsknecht that is on an errand for the crown.
A landsknecht that was guarding a caravan that got hit by an avalanche.
A landsknecht that needs healing after being hit by a falling boulder.
A landsknecht that is in fact a wildknecht, that plans to rob the heroes when they fall asleep.
A landsknecht that is lost and needs directions.
A landsknecht that is seeking a wanted criminal that one of the heroes fit the description for.
A landsknecht that is on a mission for the tiberlites.
A landsknecht that has lost all his equipment.
A landsknecht that is followed by monsters.
Miners that know the mountains and can give the heroes directions.
Miners that have lost their food.
Miners that are headed for the nearest town with a wagon load of unworked metal.
Miners that have lost their equipment and need help finding it.
Miners that have lost one of their companions and need help finding him.
Miners that are in need of healing after a bear attacked them.
Miners that are headed back for their mine, one of their members is a wanted criminal.
Miners that warn the heroes about a group of cave lions close by.
Miners that killed their mine leaders and are on the run.
Miners that are followed by monsters.
A trader, that wants to trade.
A trader, that was robbed and has nothing to trade.
A trader, that needs help finding his way.
A trader, that tries to deceive the heroes.
